description.p: Red Eclipse is a fun-filled new take on the first person arena shooter, built as a total conversion of Cube Engine 2, which lends itself toward a balanced gameplay, with a general theme of agility in a variety of environments.

ul.li: Features parkour, impulse boosts, dashing, and other tricks
Favourite gamemodes with an array of mutators and variables
Builtin editor lets you create your own maps cooperatively online
